list_definition.definition: (of a noun) referring to something which exists as an idea and which is not physically real

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Truth, poverty and bravery are abstract nouns.

list_definition.definition: (of painting, sculpture etc) concerned with colour/color, shape, texture etc rather than showing things as they really appear
a painting, sculpture etc concerned with colour/color, shape, texture etc rather than showing things as they really appear
a summary (of a book, article etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: All articles must be accompanied by an abstract of no more than 250 words.
